column1: The Elves of Doriath were those Sindar that lived in the broad forests of central Beleriand
column4: under the Kingship of Thingol and later Dior. These people
column5: whose Melian was of the order of the Maiar and whose King was the High King of the Sindar
column6: were held to be the highest and noblest of the Sindar kindred.
